promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple beetle grass-type pokemon with stone wings. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or beetle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Petralisk, a a chibi young simple beetle grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Beauty-GX, Tone-Deaf. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "beetle", "grass" or "Petralisk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, beetle-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This chibi critter, with vibrancy and tone-deafness, inhabits leafy habitats. Utilising Beauty-GX, it dazzles foes with extraordinary allure.
